query: UPDATE store_info SET name = COALESCE(?1, name), address = COALESCE(?2, address), nif = COALESCE(?3, nif), logo_url = COALESCE(?4, logo_url), phone = COALESCE(?5, phone), email = COALESCE(?6, email), website = COALESCE(?7, website), business_day_cutoff = COALESCE(?8, business_day_cutoff), updated_at = ?9 WHERE id = ?10
